item.description:
This is for all skill levels

It's a good core workout - I felt it for a couple of days and it felt great

Colleen explained everything well and coached me with correct posture.

I hope you can make it

$15 is the drop in rate. Give it a try and if you like it they have packages you can buy.

Also Colleen has offered to do other Yoga Meetups as well. So stay tuned.

If you've never tried Yoga it's a must. You get a good strength building workout, at your own pace, while your stretching and relaxing. I don' t know how all  of that is accomplished but it is...

The class starts at 730 but please arrive at 715 to sign the waiver and so we can talk a little.

I plan on going to the New World Tavern after to sample one of the many varieties of beer they have on tap. Yum !
item.how_to_find_us: 2nd floor ask for Colleen - and I will probably be there too.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Tuesday Night Yoga
